name: Badge00
description: New beginnings are always exciting. Unlock this badge for starting the game.

name: Badge01
description: Unlock this badge for connecting up the code blocks to their outputs in Pointers.

name: Badge02
description: Unlock this badge for completing Pointers.

name: Badge03
description: Unlock this badge for starting Big O Notation.

name: Badge04
description: Unlock this badge for successfully sorting the notations into the correct order.

name: Badge05
description: Unlock this badge for getting 100% on the True/False game in Big O Notation.

name: Badge06
description: Unlock this badge for completing the Big O Notation course.

name: Badge07
description: Unlock this badge for starting Linked Lists.

name: Badge08
description: Unlock this badge for completing Linked Lists.

name: Badge09
description: Unlock this badge for completing all the courses.

name: Badge10
description: Unlock this badge for completing every course with 100% accuracy.

name: Badge11
description: Unlock this badge for completing every course in under 1 hour.
